title: Midway 1 bed 995
app_fee: 65 per adult credit check. Move in fee nonrefundable $400
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Near Midway airport.  Sunny, one bedroom unit available soon.  Recent remodeled with new paint, laminate floors, and ceramic bath. White kitchen cabinets with granite countertops. Unit has 3 closets. Stove and refrigerator included. Rent includes heat cooking gas and water. Coin laundry on site.  Must pass credit check. Unit is non-smoking. Non refundable move in fee $400. Sorry no pets.  773-908-9909 Century 21 SGR Agent owned.
